sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO UR_BOSSTOCRMSTATE_HIS ( ID_NO, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_CODE, CRM_RUN_CODE, CRM_RUN_TIME, BOSS_RUN_CODE, BOSS_RUN_TIME, RUN_CODE, LOGIN_NO, OP_TIME, REMARK, IN_LOGIN_ACCEPT, IN_LOGIN_NO, IN_OP_TIME, IN_REMARK) SELECT ID_NO, LOGIN_ACCEPT, OP_CODE, CRM_RUN_CODE, CRM_RUN_TIME, BOSS_RUN_CODE, BOSS_RUN_TIME, RUN_CODE, LOGIN_NO, OP_TIME, REMARK, #OPT_SN#, #LOGIN_NO#, sysdate, #REMARK# FROM UR_BOSSTOCRMSTATE_INFO WHERE ID_NO=#ID_NO#
